javadoc: Utility class for providing convenience methods for working with {@link Option}'s.

methods.name: containsOption
methods.comment: Checks to see whether or not the given list of options contains the given option name.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: The name of the option to check.

params.name: options
params.comment: A list of the all the options.

return.comment: True if the given list contains the given option; otherwise, false.

methods.name: getOption
methods.comment: Gets the value of the option with the given name from the given list of options.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: The name of the option to get.

params.name: options
params.comment: The list of options to get the option from.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment: A default option value to use if the option name was not found.

return.comment:
The value of the option with the given name, or the default value if it was not 
   found.

methods.name: getBooleanOptionValue
methods.comment: Gets the boolean value of the option with the given name from the given list of options.

params.name: optionName
params.comment: The name of the boolean option to get.

params.name: options
params.comment: The list of options to get the option from.

params.name: defaultValue
params.comment: A default option value to use if the option name was not found.

return.comment:
The boolean value of the option with the given name, or the default value if it was 
   not found as a boolean option.

name: OptionUtils
comment: Utility class for providing convenience methods for working with Option's.
